title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: spaghetti pasta, eggs, bacon, parmesan cheese, black pepper, garlic
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce
instructions: Cook pasta al dente. Mix eggs with cheese. Combine with hot pasta and crispy bacon.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
ingredients: quinoa, chickpeas, avocado, spinach, cherry tomatoes, tahini, lemon juice
description: Nutritious plant-based bowl packed with protein and vegetables
instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast chickpeas. Assemble bowl with fresh vegetables and tahini dressing.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: chicken breast, tomatoes, heavy cream, onions, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, cumin
description: Creamy and aromatic Indian curry with tender chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in spices. Cook in tomato-cream sauce until tender.

title: Quick Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snap peas, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil
description: Fast and healthy vegetable dish perfect for weeknight dinners
instructions: Heat oil in wok. Stir fry vegetables until crisp-tender. Add sauce.

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: pizza dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, olive oil, salt
description: Classic Italian pizza with simple fresh ingredients
instructions: Roll out dough. Add sauce and cheese. Bake until golden. Top with fresh basil.

title: Thai Green Curry
ingredients: coconut milk, green curry paste, chicken thigh, thai eggplant, bamboo shoots, fish sauce, palm sugar, thai basil
description: Fragrant and spicy Thai curry with coconut milk
instructions: Simmer curry paste in coconut milk. Add chicken and vegetables. Season to taste.

title: Keto Avocado Salad
ingredients: avocado, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, feta cheese, olive oil, lemon juice
description: Low-carb salad perfect for ketogenic diet
instructions: Chop vegetables. Combine with dressing. Top with crumbled feta.

title: Beef Bourguignon
ingredients: beef chuck roast, red wine, carrots, onions, mushrooms, bacon, thyme, bay leaves, flour
description: Classic French braised beef dish with rich wine sauce
instructions: Brown beef and vegetables. Braise slowly in wine until tender.

title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
ingredients: gluten-free flour, eggs, milk, baking powder, sugar, vanilla extract, butter
description: Fluffy pancakes safe for gluten-sensitive diets
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Combine with wet ingredients. Cook on griddle until golden.

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
ingredients: quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, feta cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, oregano
description: Fresh and healthy salad with Mediterranean flavors
instructions: Cook quinoa. Chop vegetables. Toss with dressing and herbs.
